cab.content: The French Military Attache at Petrograd wired to Paris on the 18th September as follows!-The American Railway Mission has so far eome to an agreement with the Russian Government only as regards the Siberian lines where 200 American engineers or foremen are now being installed in principal stations; as regards other lines, the American Mission is only making recommendations with a view to improvements.I consider that no appreciable improvement in Russian railways can, in any case, be expected before next Spring, and that, on the other hand, the situation is likely to get worse in November.
